title: 2023-glbio
text:
Quarto enables you to weave together content and executable code into a finished document. Explore Quartoâ€™s formats, themes, and more here!
Quarto is language-agnostic: you can install it from the terminal, through RStudio, or VSCode. You can incorporate R/Py/Julia/Observable scripts seamlessly and weave them together into a single website, html_doc, dashboard, e-book, presentation, or publication of your choice!

title: Tables
text: You can search, sort, and query the table interactively. In addition, you can show/hide specific columns using the Column visibility button.
